overview: Vance Winter, Cameron Marshall, and Josh Vaughn play blue collar dudes who toss out their tape measures and replace them with their buddy's colossal cocks. Cameron Taylor drives his huge piece into Lucas, while mammoth meat eater Kai gets ripped a new one by Chad. Stand out scenes include Cameron Marshall taking every inch of Cort's massive tool, and a threeway that features Josh getting plowed by both Vance and Lee. Size does matter, and this feature from Chi Chi LaRue truly measures up!
title: Measure Up
